name: WorkMesh
tagline: Docs-first, MCP-ready project/task orchestration in plain text next to your code.

steps: say: Bootstrap WorkMesh in this repo. Use MCP if available, otherwise CLI.
say: Use WorkMesh to document this feature end to end: tasks, PRD updates, and decisions.

bootstrap_behavior.modern_workmesh_layout: run health checks, show context, and suggest next work
bootstrap_behavior.legacy_layout: run migrate audit/plan/apply and continue on modern layout
bootstrap_behavior.long_lived_clone_workflow: keep work moving now and recommend migration to canonical repo + worktrees

feature_prompt: Use WorkMesh for this feature. Create/update PRD, break down tasks with acceptance criteria and definition of done, keep context current, and track decisions in Truth Ledger.

auto_session.default: ON in interactive non-CI terminals, OFF in CI/non-interactive contexts
